metadata.title: CVE-2021-22236 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Due to improper handling of OAuth client IDs, new subscriptions generatedOAuth tokens on an incorrect OAuth client application. This vulnerabilityis present in GitLab CE/EE since version 14.1.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
